statements: UPDATE population_density_analysis SET population_count = 150000, population_density = 3000.75 WHERE region_id = 1;
UPDATE population_density_analysis SET land_area = 100.25, population_density = 4000.25 WHERE region_id = 2;
UPDATE population_density_analysis SET population_density = population_count / land_area WHERE region_id = 1;
